author: ruidp
title: Good jumper
review:
I bought this one specially for the wheels.
Pros:
This is the best jumper, because of the big wheels and light weight.
New pieces (wheels, curved slopes 1x3)
Nice looking.
Cons:
Low piece count, this is the one with less pieces.
Big juniorized pieces on the sides.
The ramp is poor.
The stickers come off easily.
